2052.subject: FRSI
2052.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the first semester of Farsi. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment must enroll in FRSI 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in FRSI 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment, must enroll in FRSI 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in FRSI 201 or 202.
